paper_title.en: Two definitions of the bridge index of a welded knot
On knots with no 3-state
Delta-crossing number for knots
On effective 9-colorings for knots

description.en: For a 1- or 2-dimensional knot, we give a lower bound log(2) n + 1 of the minimum number of distinct colors for all effective n-colorings. In particular, we prove that any effectively 9-colorable 1- or ribbon 2-knot is presented by a diagram where exactly five colors of nine are assigned to the arcs or sheets.

publisher.en: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD

publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF KNOT THEORY AND ITS RAMIFICATIONS

paper_title.en: The state numbers of a virtual knot

description.en: A state of a virtual knot diagram D is a disjoint union of circles obtained from D by splicing all real crossings. For each integer n > 0, we denote by s(n)(D) the number of states of D consisting of n circles. The state number of a virtual knot K is the minimal number of s(n)(D) for all diagrams D of K and denoted by s(n)(K). The aim of this paper is to study s(n)(D) and sn(K).
